title: Giro Stage 10 TT: Rogli훾 Claws Back Time on UAE Double Threat, Hoole Hits out for Career-Topping Win
content:
Giro d'Italia takes new complexion as Del Toro suffers losses to pink jersey advantage, Rogli훾 and Ayuso stamp authority, Lidl-Trek powerhouse Hoole storms to career-topping win.

Read the full article at Giro Stage 10 TT: Rogli훾 Claws Back Time on UAE Double Threat, Hoole Hits out for Career-Topping Win on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
